text: Marisa Ingemi is an American sports journalist and broadcaster. She has written for the Boston Herald, and espnW. She also served as the play-by-play commentator for the Boston Pride in the NWHL, the Boston Cannons and for Boston University. As reporter for the Herald, she reported that the Boston Bruins were the only NHL team not to offer financial support for staff during the 2019-20 coronavirus outbreak. The Bruins later provided financial support for their employees.https://boston.cbslocal.com/2020/03/26/bruins-owner- jeremy-jacobs-intense-scrutiny-paying-employees-coronavirus-shutdown/ Later that year, she was the first to report on the Boston Pride's trade for the 1st overall pick in the 2020 NWHL Draft. She also covers lacrosse, having broken the news of the National Lacrosse League's expansion to San Diego and Philadelphia in 2018. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American sports announcers Category:Boston University alumni Category:Lacrosse announcers Category:Women sports journalists Category:American feminists
title: Marisa Ingemi
